    • Method Detail

      • testCardSetup

        public void testCardSetup()
        This tests the setup of the individual cards. It tests the setSuit(), getSuit(), setRank(), and getRank() setters and getters in the card class.

      • testCardFlipping

        public void testCardFlipping()
        This tests the functions that cause the cards to flip. It sets up a card then tests if it is flipped or not using the setIsFlipped() and getIsFlipped() setters and getters in the card class.

      • testCardToString

        public void testCardToString()
        This tests if the toString() function in the Card class.

      • testDeckSize

        public void testDeckSize()
        This tests that when a deck is created, it creates all 52 cards. By testing the deckSize() function in the deck class.

      • testDeckIsEmpty

        public void testDeckIsEmpty()
        This tests the isEmpty() function in the deck class. It initializes a deck of cards and makes sure the isEmpty() function is reading the amount of cards in the deck properly. It also checks the dealToPile() function.

      • testDeckGetCard

        public void testDeckGetCard()
        This tests to make sure the getCard() function from the deck class recognizes when there is not enough cards to get the card the user is asking for.

      • testDeckAddCardAndToString

        public void testDeckAddCardAndToString()
        This tests the addCard() and toString() functions of the deck class.

      • testPileType

        public void testPileType()
        This tests the setPileType() and getPileType() setters and getters from the Pile class.

      • testPileRemoveCards

        public void testPileRemoveCards()
        This tests the addCard(), removeCard(), removeFirstCard(), removeLastCard(), isEmpty(), getPileSize(), and getLastCard() functions from the Pile class.

      • testPileToString

        public void testPileToString()
        This tests the toString() function in the pile class.
